org.apache.hadoop.registry.server.dns

Class SecureableZone

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbill.DNS.Zone
      • org.apache.hadoop.registry.server.dns.SecureableZone
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class SecureableZone
extends org.xbill.DNS.Zone
    A zone implementation geared to support some DNSSEC functionality.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
